dialog: "The story, names, characters and incidents portrayed in this film are ficticious." "Any resemblance to actual events is purely coincidental.â Look!
It's not a robot, but a rice cooker!
A huge rice cooker boils water and makes electricity.
There's no rice cooker that big!
Because of that, we live in comfort.
And that will make our country rich.
If we open it, it'll be trouble!
Granny says if you don't, you're dead!
They're all here early, getting ready for work.
Who says you deserve to sleep in?
I only had enough for one.
President Kang returned from a fiveday visit to the middle east.
That man is always on the go.
He's trying to revive our economy.
He landed plant project orders worth $5 billion...
You had drinks with girls last night, didn't you?
How far did you go with them?
Why not take him and break his legs.
She's got you on a leash!
We want a nuclear free world!
You live in comfort thanks to that!
If you don't shut down unit 1, we're all dead!
They even lied down on the road!
Sleeping on a full stomach is bad.
Why didn't god take him instead of my wife!
He says that all the time!
It's going to be a long day.
Nuclear power uses the heat generated from fission...
And the steam to turn turbines and produce electricity.
Simply, nuclear reactor is like firewood, and the steam turbine is like a rice cooker.
The only alternative energy source, that is ecofriendly, preventing global warming.
It is high efficient business with low cost.
The building can withstand an earthquake of magnitude 7, perfectly safe in any circumstances.
With safety inspections, the risk of danger is 0%.
Please note that behind all your comfort, the nuclear power plant is constantly running.
Before that was built, our town was poor but livable.
No fishing, no farming, and no tourists.
Town folks are divided and fighting.
Still, we make a living thanks to that.
Think we would've starved without that?
Today can be your last day.
How many times did I tell you to just buy a new one?
You know I can't afford to.
Stop being bossy with trivial skills.
You come here and try it.
Now even sick of fixing that for me?
No, Just in case I'm not around...
What are you planning this time?
Catching pike in South America and in Alaska.
If I work in the engine room, I'll make even more!
I have no parents, siblings, or relatives!
You know you're all I have.
He wants you to read it.
Why did it come through you?
They were afraid it wouldn't get to you.
Status report: Hanbyul nuclear plant unit 1.
Nuclear reactors run fine with proper coolant.
No, it will run for dozens of years.
That's why nuclear energy is great.
The best gift ever given to humans!
But it'll be a trouble like this.
He initiated the reactor without full repair...
Just to to pass the special law on nuclear plants.
To pretend all is fine and safe.
We haven't had any major accidents.
President received the report, but don't expect much.
Just 2 years there, I'll recoup what I lost.
I don't want to hear it!
You want to live here forever?
You'll push him to work at the plant too?
Then we should go to Seoul for his education.
Why make him stay in this hell?
Brother's dying wish was to take a good care of him.
Think of your only grandson's future!
Cut it out and stay put.
Don't you feel sorry for Yeonju?
But I want to sleep with you!
Good morning, this is an announcement...
He hates working at the plant.
I feel bad he's forced to work there.
That plant killed my husband and son.
Think I want my only son there?
So I gave him the compensation money of his dad to open a shop in the city.
I hoped for his success and wished he never had to return.
He lost it all and came back empty.
That fool deserves to work in hell if he has to!
But the government gave benefits only for franchises...
I forgot to buy soy sauce.
How could he lose that money?
It's the price of his dad's life!
I told you to handle that report.
Why let it get to the president?
We found the writer today and he is now removed.
Status report: Hanbyul nuclear plant unit 1.
Among the laws that passed by you recently...
Power plant development special law seemed to be pushed irrationally.
Building nuclear plants is not an easy business.
I was told you gave approval.
If there is a problem, I'll use the veto to set it right.
The government must not waste time like this.
We must strive to revive the economy together.
You've been appointed by head office.
Since you've worked hard out here...
Now you can take it easy and help train workers.
And your report got many presidential secretaries fired.
Work on a ship to waste 2 years?
Think I should devote my life to this damn plant?
You hate here because of your dad and brother.
But they won't let you go!
A man's gotta do, what a man's gotta do!
I knew things were too quiet.
Looks like a storm is coming!
Go and let me know if anything's wrong.
An earthquake occurred in the southeast.
Major industrial complexes are in the southeast.
He has other things to worry.
There's nothing to gain by us being in opposition.
Don't like the way I run the country?
Your decision making was too slow since you were a senator.
An administration can't be led like that.
Especially when the economy is at stake.
There's a crack in cooling unit 1 by the earthquake.
Yes, we temporarily stabilized the reactors.
We'll find the crack and fix it.
This is not just an accident!
Wasn't it built to resist earthquakes?
Even house pipes crack in 40 years.
Pipes are 170 km and wires are 1700 km.
Checking all defects and rusts, takes years to figure out!
But all that was done in just 2 months!
Issue a code white alert and inform the locals.
We were in trouble for that before...
My husband and son in heaven must've helped us.
Tell them to answer the phone!
Tell him to worry about himself.
I'd better get back to the office.
No earthquake can bring that plant down.
If something's wrong, text messages are sent.
Or else they'd be in trouble like last time.
If it's so urgent, go in yourself!
There's a crack in the coolant valve and it's leaking.
Then why not go in and fix it?
No one wants to go in.
The coolant level is going down!
Loca? "Loss of coolant accident." Don't just stand there!
If you fix it this way, pipe pressure will rise.
I'm not gonna die fixing a valve here!
Fine! Let's just hurry it up!
What the hell is going on?
The workers said that will save time.
If the cracks aren't fixed, we'll all die of radiation!
We should go in and fix it!
Shut up and take off your uniforms!
We didn't want to worry you.
Calm down and let's talk measures.
If the coolant is leaking, isn't radiation exposed?
But the leak is within the plant...
We should issue a code blue and evacuate the locals.
People know too much about nuclear accidents.
If we reveal the accident and order the evacuations...
We may be criticized later, but it's better than mass chaos.
Disaster safety team has been sent.
There are various levels of control systems at the plant.
And it's not as serious as you may think.
It is, but pressure is rising too fast.
Pressure is rising from loca, but no way to stop it.
Releasing the air inside the plant.
It is more serious than we thought.
If fuel rods get exposed to air...
Temperature will increase and melt the fuel.
Hydrogen generated raises pressure in the containment chamber.
Currently, it's beyond the pressure limit.
So radioactive materials should be released?
Issue orders to evacuate the locals at once!
Mr. president, within 20 km of the plant.
There must be a plan for a time like this!
An evacuation that large has never been done.
We should evacuate the locals closest to the plant at least.
It'll be fatal upon direct contact.
It'll take over 3 hours to evacuate them.
If the plant explodes before then, things will get worse.
At worst, all citizens could be in danger.
Find the bus with your town name!
Stop! We gotta get out now!
The containment chamber is filled with hydrogen!
If it explodes, we're all dead!
Chief, workers are leaving the site!
Then we can't bring the pressure down!
No one leaves here until it's clear!
Think you'll live if you run?
Run or not, it's the same!
Then we'll die with our families!
Get to work! It's the only way to save ourselves and families!
It will open once the situation is over!
Are being taken to a shelter But there is traffic on route 31.
The pressure level is 3 times the limit.
Wait till the locals are evacuated.
Will you put 50 million citizens in danger for just 17,000 people?
No one has the right to sacrifice them for us!
We can open the vents manually!
Here is the pressure control chamber!
Hold on! I'll get you out!
From now on, set it an emergency zone.
Say it's a drill and evacuate locals within 20 km.
If they pour out into the streets...
If so, Daegu, Daejeon and Seoul will collapse.
Plus, all nearby plants must be stopped.
People will be running in the dark.
If we stopped the explosion, it wouldn't be this bad.
Was there an explosion at hanbyul nuclear power plant?
A small coolant leakage in unit 1 around 2 pm.
Locals within 5 km have been evacuated.
Then why enforce the national crisis control?
If there was an explosion, we should go far away.
We need an order in times like this.
Don't worry and please wait inside.
Even with full armor on, we'll be exposed.
All nearby rescue teams are sent.
The rescue is being done quickly.
I'll report on the number of fatalities.
Pouring coolant through the roof is the only way.
We should go in to secure water routes.
Cool the fuel rods at all costs!
The radiation level is too high.
We need to decontaminate first, then find a way in.
We're doing the best we can.
Take my family and go far away.
That won't cool down on its own!
Team 2 and 3, prepare to pump water!
It won't cool down on its own!
I was at the plant too!
We are awaiting updates on the situation.
Meanwhile, please let the agents know if there is anything you need.
If you're ill, please go see medical team.
There was an explosion at the plant.
We gotta get out of here.
The roof of unit 1 is gone!
Who said we can't use seawater?
If we use seawater, the reactor is decommissioned.
We don't know the status inside.
You know how much unit 1 costs!
I was given orders not to use seawater too.
I told him not to go back!
Atomcare is running a radiation exposure assessment.
It'll give us simulations every hour.
Don't let the president see this.
Press is demanding facts on the accident...
Strictly warn them not to spread any news.
The radiation is coming and we're stuck!
If it weren't you, we could've ran!
You know how scary radiation is!
You saw when your husband passed away!
My husband was lucky to have cancer!
It's more deadly for kids like Minjae!
I didn't know this would happen.
If we pull out, it's over!
We can't bring the radiation down like this!
The IAEA found out about the accident.
There's a spent fuel rod storage near reactor chamber.
CCTV on the tank's ceiling is aired live on IAEA.
It's the same for all nuclear plants worldwide.
They saw water level drop after the explosion.
Why is the water level dropping?
The explosion must've caused a crack.
Only a wall separates the reactor chamber and storage tank.
What happens if the water level drops?
If the coolant is gone, the rods are exposed to air...
A hydrogen explosion will occur and eventually...
Only a concrete wall exists so massive radiation will leak.
Dangerous rods were kept inside a regular building?
We don't have a spent fuel processing facility.
We have enough problems with the reactor...
Countries such as the U.S., China and Japan...
And all is being reported through foreign press.
We must get out of here!
A containment chamber explosion occured at hanbyul nuclear unit 1.
Workers and firefighters are at the plant...
But huge amounts of radiation have already been exposed.
The bastards locked us to hide the accident!
That means they don't care if we die or not!
People will pour into the streets!
Then we'd be stuck in traffic!
The government sent troops to the site...
Meanwhile, huge amounts of radiation spreaded.
Thousands of innocent civilians have been exposed.
Radioactive materials may sweep the entire country.
What is the government doing in this critical situation?
Countries including the U.S., Japan and China...
Are evacuating their citizens from Korea, which shows how desperate the situation is.
Korea has too many nuclear plants for its size.
As they are located in densely populated areas...
If the accident is like the Fukushima disaster...
At least 1.5 million people will be exposed to radiation.
And 11.6% of the country will become dead land.
Even the police and the military have lost control.
There's no plan to control the situation.
The only solution is to leave the country at once.
I told you we should've ran away!
I'm on the highway north, but it's jammed.
All the town folks are here.
Go as far as you can!
The other side is wide open.
Hanbyul unit 1 casualties on the rise.
But radiation level is too high and for that rescue teams are ill.
And they can't even figure out the inner damage.
The country is out of control.
Train station, bus terminals, airports and ports...
At this rate, our economy may never recover!
We must declare a national emergency and enforce martial law.
Will you just sit and watch?
I have to take care of them!
He's been demoted for handing you that report.
Do you even know what's going on out there?
Did you check everything before giving up?
Miju and I aren't going anywhere.
Think about what you should do.
I think you should take the call.
What were you doing till now?
We need to enforce martial law!
I'm in control from now on.
Since it's urgent, this will be the situation room.
I made a call for cooperation.
As of now, report everything to me.
Allow the firefighters to use the seawater at once.
There will be no hope for this country.
President said send anyone who disrupts...
If you don't believe me, call and check!
Tell them to douse the fire!
Hoses are connected for quick supply of water.
And maintain the reactor in stable condition.
Now, we must fix the spent fuel storage tank.
We need to know the current situation.
I need status on the spent fuel storage.
It seems there's a crack on the floor.
The leaking causes coolant level to drop.
That's more dangerous than the reactor!
If the tank blows, it's over!
To prevent that, we need to know the situation.
Coolant is leaking through a 10 mm wide 4 m long crack.
We must seal the crack to stop the leak.
But there is kneehigh coolant in the tank.
Because of high radiation, we can't last 10 minutes.
We need people to fix it risking their life.
If they leave, we can't go anywhere!
Look! The wind is blowing this way!
Still, how can we walk away from that?
It's jammed up, so we're walking.
You can't go far on foot!
Go as far as you can.
Military engineers were criticized and seeking for alternatives.
Can't send the troops, knowing they'll die.'  Army Captain Hard to find routes in short time.'  Nuclear Expert President is making a statement.
And embarrassed in front of you.
Is ask a very difficult request.
Hanbyul unit 1 is in a detrimental state.
I sadly admit that there's nothing...
I can't order anyone to fix the crack.
So I'm asking you for help.
I ask you to repair for your beloved ones and our country.
On behalf of this weak government...
Please save our families and our country.
What fool would go in there?
They cause the accident, then ask citizens to fix it?
We're the only ones who can go.
If you go in, you'll die!
We took in too much radiation.
Are you out of your mind?
Why should we go in there?
If no one stops the leak, we all die!
They tried to hide it and got people killed.
Now, they ask the people to fix things.
Our families are on the streets.
The radiation is coming after them.
So they're all walking out there.
It's unfair and I'm mad as hell...
There's no one else, but us.
Even if you don't, I'm going in!
What's living a few more days?
If you can walk, get up!
I was exposed too much radiation.
But I have to do this.
I'm going in to save you and my family.
What good is living without you?
What's he doing not taking care of us?
Minjae! I'm so sorry I lost you.
You sure this is the only way?
It has to be you and others?
Die after we are okay without you.
But then you volunteer to go back?
I'll explain things on the way.
I don't want to hear it.
Let's die and start fresh with your mom in heaven.
Proud you took in all that radiation?
I ate as much as you boys!
Take care till I get back.
The waste storage under the tank.
There's contaminated coolant up to your knee.
So gears and protections won't matter.
You'll be able to work about 5 minutes inside.
Take them as needed, though they may not work.
You must be in pain too.
I took a bottle of them.
The coolant level is down to dangerous levels.
But the radiation is too high, we can't go in.
Looks like we're really going in to die.
We're not going in to die, but to save.
They went back in to do the repairs!
He didn't go in, did he?
Did he go in or not?
He said he'll come back alive!
Let me go! I have to go to him!
I have to go to him.
Chief, please hurry as much as you can.
Repair of storage tank just begun.
Where one can't return alive due to high radiation...
And firefighters are fighting battle to save...
How is the team that just came out?
Chief? How is the repair going?
I don't know if good is the word to use.
Cracks got bigger and the coolant is flooding.
Cracks got worse and can't be repaired.
What if we seal the entrance?
What if we block it off and blow the ceiling?
Wouldn't that chamber become a tank?
Seal off the entrance and make a new tank.
We blow the ceiling, that is, the floor of the tank above.
Then the rods will fall into the new tank.
To wait till the explosives are set then seal off the entrance.
Then someone won't be able to come out?
There's only one who can set explosives.
I should've learned it when I could.
I ran out of pills and it hurts too much.
Can't I just blast it now?
I didn't get to see Jaehyuk or hear his voice!
He promised to come back alive!
He's going to be on TV.
I can't see you, but you see me, right?
I'll go first and take care of dad and bro.
See Minjae get married and have kids.
Thank you for taking care of mom even when my brother is gone.
But I was too shy to say.
Mad that I didn't keep my promise?
I wanted to live even a day just with you.
I wanted to have the dinner you've cooked, then die comfortably in your arms.
I can't keep the promise I made...
I really dreamed of our future.
It's not too much to ask!
Why do I have to die like this?
I don't want to die like this.
It hurts so much and I'm terrified!
I didn't mean to do that.
Then I won't regret dying like this.
That I wasn't such a loser...
The fuel rods are in the new tank!
The fuel rods are in the new tank!
We'll fill the tank with coolant then the rods will be stable!
Mr. president, his name is Kang Jaehyuk.
Why do you hate the nuclear plant?
I don't. I'm scared of it.
The nuclear plant is getting old.
But no one seems worried or interested.
It's scary that no one cares.
We should think of the children like Minjae.
Do you want to pass on a rich world to the children?
Or a safe and comfortable world?
We can't cover our eyes and ears because we're scared.
There's disaster, evil, but also hope.
Korea has the highest density of nuclear power plants.
and 28 counties are within 30 km of 4 nuclear plants.
Since the Fukushima, many countries are phasing out nuclear plants.
But Korea is building 6 nuclear plants and has plans for 4 more.
